name: unsoldierly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not typical of a soldier or not suitable for a soldier: He was the most unsoldierly soldier you could imagine. Hesitancy was deemed an unsoldierly trait.
More examplesFewer examplesThe men were accused of "unsoldierly conduct".They resembled real soldiers only when they were complaining, and even their complaining was done in an unsoldierly manner.The cartoonist was accused of setting a bad example with his "unsoldierly" characters.He moved along the disorderly, unsoldierly column.My unsoldierly friend has never been tested in battle.The prisoners-of-war who worked locally wore unsoldierly uniforms.
